detectors.description: Variable Memphiscoin._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#39) is not in mixedCase

Memphiscoin.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#49-57) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 12500000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#53)
detectors.markdown:
[Memphiscoin.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#L49-L57) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [_totalSupply = 12500000000000000000000](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#L53)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#8)
	- Memphiscoin.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#59-61)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Memphiscoin.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#63-65)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#9)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Memphiscoin.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#67-69)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#10)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Memphiscoin.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#77-82)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#11)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Memphiscoin.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#71-75)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#12)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#28)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Memphiscoin.sol#28-30)
